text.p: The proofs of Proposition 1 are similar to those of Wei et al. and Liu et al. and, therefore, are omitted here. Furthermore, one can refer to the works of Tian et al. and Gou et al. for more definitions of information measures such as cross-entropy, relative entropy, and hesitant entropy. The proposed entropy measure for PHFLTS entails the advantages of superior interpretability and applicability. In addition, it preserves the ability to measure the information contained in PHFLTSs and assure the reliability of the derived weights, as discussed in the subsequent section.
